divs: sighting detailsin the house, saw the light outside kitchen window, towards eastern horizon. watched it go back and forth on the horizon, then drop out of sight. light was blue\violet, the color of blue dot tail lights. moved quickly and then was gone.
Summary: blue dot colored light moving across eastern sky, then stopped and dropped out of view
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Simi Valley
There were no other sightings in Simi Valley on or around July 29th 2013
